summary:
PhD in Environmental Sciences (Meteorology)
Stable boundary layers over Land and Ice
Fog
Urban Meteorology

International Projects
HYDRALABIII&IV: Fluid Mechanics watertank experiments CNRM/CNRS, Toulouse, France
GABLS: GEWEX Atmospheric boundary layer study.
PILPS-urban: Model intercomparison of atmospheric models for the urban environment
BLLAST: Boundary Layer Late Afternoon and Sunset Turbulence: Mesoscale modeling and radiation divergence observations.

Teaching experience:
Several subjects (Meteorology & Climate; Mesoscale modelling, Fluid Mechanics, Academic Consultancy Training)
Guidance BSc and MSc research
University Teaching Qualification (UTQ/BKO)

Specialties: Boundary Layer Meteorology
Fog
Urban Meteorology
Evaluation weather forecast models
Wind energy
Climate modelling

authors.headline: PhD Candidate at Wageningen University & Research

profile_positions.description: This position covers research in the field of the atmospheric boundary layer over land and ice, and in particular for so called stably stratified conditions, i.e. at night and in wintertime. Fog research is an major part of the project. In addition, understanding and forecasting the urban boundary layer (urban heat island, human comfort) for Dutch conditions is also captured.
profile_positions.title: Associate Professor

profile_positions.description: This position covers research in the field of the atmospheric boundary layer over land and ice, and in particular for so called stably stratified conditions, i.e. at night and in wintertime. Fog research is an major part of the project. In addition, understanding and forecasting the urban boundary layer (urban heat island, human comfort) for Dutch conditions is also captured.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Professor

profile_positions.description: I do research on the evaluation and improvement of weather forecast models, especially mesoscale models, as MM5 and WRF. Furthermore I am involved in urban meteorology.
profile_positions.title: Postdoc

profile_positions.description: PhD student on the improvement of weather and climate models, in particular for stably startified atmospheric conditions.
profile_positions.title: PhD student
